reasoning: Umbrella term too heterogeneous to estimate meaningfully. Includes diverse pathogens (Pneumocystis, CMV, Candida, Cryptococcus, Toxoplasma, atypical mycobacteria) affecting different immunocompromised populations (HIV/AIDS, transplant, chemotherapy, immunosuppression). Incidence depends entirely on underlying condition and pathogen - no single aggregate estimate is epidemiologically valid.
